jobActions.name: Dosis
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 300.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

jobActions.name: Diagnosis
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 450

jobActions.name: Kardia
jobActions.description: Grants self the effect of Kardia and a selected party member or self the effect of Kardion, restoring HP after casting certain magic attacks.

jobActions.name: Prognosis
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 300

jobActions.name: Egeiro
jobActions.description: Resurrects target to a weakened state.

jobActions.name: Physis
jobActions.description:
Gradually restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Phlegma
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 400 for the first enemy, and 30% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Maximum Charges: 2
Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.

jobActions.name: Eukrasia
jobActions.description:
Augments certain offensive and healing magic actions.
Dosis III is upgraded to Eukrasian Dosis III.
Diagnosis is upgraded to Eukrasian Diagnosis.
Prognosis is upgraded to Eukrasian Prognosis.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

jobActions.name: Eukrasian Diagnosis
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 300
Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling 180％ of the amount of HP restored. When critical HP is restored, also grants Differential Diagnosis, nullifying damage equaling 180% the amount of HP restored.
Duration: 30s
Effect cannot be stacked with Eukrasian Prognosis or scholar's Galvanize.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Eukrasian Prognosis
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 100
Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling 320% of the amount of HP restored
Duration: 30s
Effect cannot be stacked with those of Eukrasian Diagnosis or scholar's Galvanize.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Eukrasian Dosis
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage over time.
Potency: 40
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Soteria
jobActions.description:
Grants 4 stacks of Soteria, each stack increasing the cure potency of Kardion effects granted by you by 70%.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Icarus
jobActions.description:
Rush to a targeted enemy's or party member's location.
Unable to cast if bound.

jobActions.name: Druochole
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 600
Additional Effect: Restores 7% of maximum MP
Addersgall Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Dyskrasia
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 160 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

jobActions.name: Kerachole
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.
Duration: 15s
Effect cannot be stacked with Taurochole.
Additional Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Restores 7% of maximum MP
Addersgall Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Ixochole
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 400
Additional Effect: Restores 7% of maximum MP
Addersgall Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Zoe
jobActions.description:
Increases healing magic potency of your next healing spell by 50%.
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Pepsis
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members by removing Eukrasian Diagnosis and Eukrasian Prognosis effects granted by you.
Eukrasian Diagnosis Cure Potency: 450
Eukrasian Prognosis Cure Potency: 350
Targets not under the effect of Eukrasian Diagnosis or Eukrasian Prognosis will not be healed.

jobActions.name: Physis II
jobActions.description:
Gradually restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 130
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Increases HP recovered by healing actions by 10%
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Taurochole
jobActions.description:
Restores own or target party member's HP.
Cure Potency: 700
Additional Effect: Reduces target's damage taken by 10%
Duration: 15s
Effect cannot be stacked with Kerachole.
Additional Effect: Restores 7% of maximum MP
Addersgall Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Toxikon
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 300 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Addersting Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Haima
jobActions.description:
Erects a magicked barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 300 potency.
Additional Effect: Grants 5 stacks of Haimatinon
Duration: 15s
When the barrier is completely absorbed, a stack of Haimatinon is consumed and a new barrier is applied.
When the effect duration expires, a healing effect is then applied.
Cure Potency: 150 per remaining stack of Haimatinon

jobActions.name: Dosis II
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 320.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

jobActions.name: Phlegma II
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 490 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Maximum Charges: 2
Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.

jobActions.name: Eukrasian Dosis II
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage over time.
Potency: 60
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Rhizomata
jobActions.description: Grants 1 stack of Addersgall.

jobActions.name: Holos
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 300
Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling the amount of HP restored
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Panhaima
jobActions.description:
Erects a magicked barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 200 potency.
Additional Effect: Grants 5 stacks of Panhaimatinon
Duration: 15s
When the barrier is completely absorbed, a stack of Panhaimatinon is consumed and a new barrier is applied.
When the effect duration expires, a healing effect is then applied.
Cure Potency: 100 per remaining stack of Panhaimatinon

jobActions.name: Dosis III
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 330.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

jobActions.name: Phlegma III
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Maximum Charges: 2
Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.

jobActions.name: Eukrasian Dosis III
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage over time.
Potency: 75
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Dyskrasia II
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 170 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

jobActions.name: Toxikon II
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 330 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Addersting Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Krasis
jobActions.description:
Increases HP recovery via healing actions for a party member or self by 20%.
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Pneuma
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 330 for the first enemy, and 40% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of all party members within a radius of 20 yalms
Cure Potency: 600
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.

roleActions.name: Repose
roleActions.description:
Afflicts target with Sleep.
Duration: 30s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

roleActions.name: Esuna
roleActions.description: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.

roleActions.name: Swiftcast
roleActions.description:
Next spell is cast immediately.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Lucid Dreaming
roleActions.description:
Gradually restores own MP.
Potency: 55
Duration: 21s

roleActions.name: Surecast
roleActions.description:
Spells can be cast without interruption.
Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 6s

roleActions.name: Rescue
roleActions.description: Instantly draws target party member to your side. Cannot be used outside of combat or when target is suffering from certain enfeeblements.

traits.name: Maim and Mend
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.

traits.name: Maim and Mend II
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.

traits.name: Addersgall
traits.description:
Grants 1 stack of Addersgall automatically every twenty seconds.
Maximum Stacks: 3
Can be charged outside of combat.

traits.name: Somanoutic Oath
traits.description: Increases the potency of Dosis to 250, Phlegma to 330, and Eukrasian Dosis to 35.

traits.name: Somanoutic Oath II
traits.description: Increases the potency of Dosis to 300, Phlegma to 400, and Eukrasian Dosis to 40.

traits.name: Addersting
traits.description:
Grants 1 stack of Addersting when the barrier granted by Eukrasian Diagnosis to any party member or the barrier granted by Eukrasian Prognosis to self is completely absorbed.
Maximum Stacks: 3

traits.name: Offensive Magic Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Dosis to Dosis II, Phlegma to Phlegma II, and Eukrasian Dosis to Eukrasian Dosis II. Also increases the potency of Toxikon to 300.

traits.name: Enhanced Kerachole
traits.description: Adds an additional effect to Kerachole that grants healing over time.

traits.name: Offensive Magic Mastery II
traits.description: Upgrades Dosis II to Dosis III, Phlegma II to Phlegma III, Eukrasian Dosis II to Eukrasian Dosis III, Dyskrasia to Dyskrasia II, and Toxikon to Toxikon II.

traits.name: Enhanced Healing Magic
traits.description: Increases the healing potency of Diagnosis to 450 and Kardia to 170. Also increases the strength of barriers granted by Eukrasian Diagnosis to 180% the amount of HP restored, and Eukrasian Prognosis to 320% the amount of HP restored.

traits.name: Enhanced Zoe
traits.description: Reduces Zoe recast time to 90 seconds.
